thread.title: DANIE BAX
thread.title_full: SHOWER SEAL LTD reviewed by DANIE BAX

author: DANIE BAX
title: DANIE BAX
text: I was uncertain of the correct seal to buy, having bought the wrong size from a local DIY big store -no one to ask for advice unfortunately. I phoned and was guided through what I needed, and also took a photo and texted it through to Ben. He was great and very helpful. I got a txt back with a link to the seal I needed. It took a couple of days, and of course, it fitted perfectly. Many Thanks.
